file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-27-16-04 - CONFIG-2 - CLASS PARTITION - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CLASS PARTITION - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH VIP-A AND VIP-B CONFIGURATION 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the class partition. B. The class partitions are installed in zones 241 and 242. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH VIP-A AND VIP-B CONFIGU- 25-27-16-000-801-A CLASS PARTITION - REMOVAL RATION AIRCRAFT WITH VIP-A AND VIP-B CONFIGU- 25-27-16-400-801-A CLASS PARTITION - INSTALLATION RATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 25-27-16 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-27-16-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH VIP-A AND VIP-B CONFIGURATION 2. CLASS PARTITION - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to remove the class partition. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 A - Does the task Passenger cabin 1 B - Helps Technician A Passenger cabin H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-004-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT CLOSE tags to them: (a) EMERG (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/LIGHTS/EMERG). (b) PASS SIGNS (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/LIGHTS/PASS SIGNS). I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 000-003-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connectors (1) and (3) from the class partitions (2) and (4). Refer to DET. B. (2) Loosen the nuts (7), washers (8), and studs (6) that attach the class partition to the lateral track (5). Refer to DET. D. (3) Loosen the nuts (9), washers (10), and studs (11) that attach the class partition to the floor track (12). Refer to DET. E. (4) Remove the class partitions (2) and (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-27-16 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH VIP-A AND VIP-B CONFIGURATION Class Partition - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A B ZONES 241 242 2. RH CLASS DET. A PARTITION 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 3. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 4. LH CLASS D PARTITION D E E DET. B 7. NUT 9. NUT 10. WASHER 6. STUD 8. WASHER 11. STUD DET. D DET. E 5. LATERAL TRACK 12. FLOOR TRACK 1 FOR AIRCRAFT WITH RH/LH AFT CLASS PARTITION EM145AMM253109A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-27-16 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-27-16-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH VIP-A AND VIP-B CONFIGURATION 3. CLASS PARTITION - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to install the class partition. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 A - Does the task Passenger cabin 1 B - Helps Technician A Passenger cabin H. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-004-A (1) Put the class partitions (2) and (4) in position. Refer to DET. B. (2) Tighten the nuts (9), washers (10), and studs (11) that attach the class partition to the floor track (12). Refer to DET. E. (3) Tighten the nuts (7), washers (8), and studs (6) that attach the class partition to the lateral track (5). Refer to DET. D. (4) Connect the electrical connectors (1) and (3). Refer to DET. B. I. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-004-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close these circuit breakers and remove the DO-NOT CLOSE tags from them: (a) EMERG (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/LIGHTS/EMERG). (b) PASS SIGNS (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/LIGHTS/PASS SIGNS). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-27-16 Page 4 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
